title: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: The line in org.eclipse.swt.internal.BidiUtil uses Class.forName() to create a new Callback object.
EB: The line should be changed to use new BidiUtil().getClass() instead of Class.forName().
SR: To reproduce the issue, change the line above to: static Callback callback = new Callback (new BidiUtil().getClass(), "windowProc", 4);
